title: When are we getting a Tribunal?
body:
When's OCE getting a Tribunal? Or any form of player behavioural reform? This server is so unbelievably "toxic" some days it's ridiculous.

How hard is it to at least implement some kind of system to try to reform the player base? Or are you lot up at Riot too busy circlejerking over your "pros" and your "e-sports?"

How about instead of focusing on your sales, and your new champions, you actually try to fix the main problem that's at the core of this "community?"

replies.body: No server has the tribunal at the moment because they are working to make it better. Just keep reporting and blocking players and moving on.
